channel.title: [VB6] Help please
channel.description:
I need some help please:
1. I have made a command button. When you click that I want it to go to a website, How would I do this?
2. I want to make an I.P tracker. I know you need a text box to enter the I.P and I want all the info in another text box. I want the info to be from www.ip-adress.com
3. How would I make a Tab strip? So there is tabs up the top and when I click it, It goes to a new interface.
Thank you in advance.

item.title: [VB6] Help please
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

[quote=“nade, post:2, topic:126676”]Seriously why don’t you google this shit. It’s all there.

  1. Don’t know what you are talking about. In the program you can use the webbrowser control (self-explanatory), if you want it to open in your default browser then http://www.vbforums.com/archive/index.php/t-348138.html

  2. Use internet transfer control (Right click on toolbar -> Components -> Internet Transfer Control)

Dim htmlSource as String
htmlSource = inet.openurl("http://www.ip-address.com")
  1. Add control (Right click on toolbar -> Components -> Microsoft Common Controls) and use the tab from there.[/quote]

Couldn’t have told him better myself

Read full topic

item.title: [VB6] Help please
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Seriously why don’t you google this shit. It’s all there.

  1. Don’t know what you are talking about. In the program you can use the webbrowser control (self-explanatory), if you want it to open in your default browser then http://www.vbforums.com/archive/index.php/t-348138.html

  2. Use internet transfer control (Right click on toolbar -> Components -> Internet Transfer Control)

Dim htmlSource as String
htmlSource = inet.openurl("http://www.ip-address.com")
  1. Add control (Right click on toolbar -> Components -> Microsoft Common Controls) and use the tab from there.

Read full topic
